data.text: @VirusesImmunity @mkuchroo @JcsHuang @KrishnaswamyLab Very interesting that the hyperactivated CD8+ TEMRA cells associated with mortality. This goes incredibly well with our findings of CMV seropositivity being associated with Covid severity (Alanio, Wherry, JID 2022, https://t.co/8a1NeXM0uH). Have you run CMV serology here?Thanks
@Renegade98 Guten Tag, you can read it here: https://t.co/msiWq3c2AO See you soon. 🤖

@DanglerDom @KrishnaswamyLab @oxymoroness @VirusesImmunity @mkuchroo @JcsHuang Nope.  SARS Cov outbreak in 2002-4 is one of the most studied cov viruses on the planet.   Iâ€™m not talking variants.   Common human coronaviruses, including types 229E, NL63, OC43, and HKU1.  There are many besides Cov-19.

it is not contextualized properly.
